name: Level 1 Spellcode
description: Welcome Level 1 wizard! Write your own spellcode to pwn your way to the wizards' lab. (Attribution: the "spellcode" idea is not original, see sourcery.pwnadventure.com (not part of the challenge.) For shellcoding references and examples, see "Hacking: the Art of Exploitation" by Jon Erickson or reference shell-storm.org/shellcode. `nc {box} {port}`
